<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2950</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Whats the word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was das Wort ist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui est le mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que é a palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è la parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Whats η λέξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuál es la palabra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A game where students match pictures to words.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel, wo Kursteilnehmer Abbildungen zu den 
Wörtern zusammenbringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu où les étudiants apparient des images 
aux mots.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo onde os estudantes combinam retratos às 
palavras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco dove gli allievi abbinano le immagini 
alle parole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι όπου οι σπουδαστές ταιριάζουν με τις 
εικόνες τις λέξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un juego donde los estudiantes corresponden con 
cuadros a las palabras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giochi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juegos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
